item.description:
I’m happy to announce that Jim Lindenschmidt will be offering a Lore And Craft Of Mead Workshop in Manchester, NH on Thursday, June 30th at 7pm. The workshop will include a small mead tasting of a few brews Jim has done, a talk about the lore and value of mead, and a demonstration of how to make your first batch of mead. Registration for the class is $30, and includes a copy of his ebook book The Lore and Craft of Mead

In addition, Jim will have brewing kits available, that include all the equipment and basic ingredients you will need to produce your first batch of mead, including a 3-gallon glass carboy, rubber stopper, airlock, funnel, siphon hose, and a hydrometer, as well as a gallon of fantastic local (to Jim in Maine) honey and a packet of yeast.

If there are any questions, or specific requests for what the class should cover, please contact Jim at BardicBrews.net! I’m very excited and looking forward to Jim sharing the magic of mead with all of us! Space is limited, so register now!

To register go to BardicBrews.net

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Mead making class!
